plot: Sofia Cross, a young debutante living an upper-class life in Manhattan, is harshly forced into the world of adulthood upon learning of a dark family secret.
title: The Debut
plot_es: Sofia Cross, a young debutante living an upper-class life in Manhattan, is harshly forced into the world of adulthood upon learning of a dark family secret.
plot_en: Sofia Cross, a young debutante living an upper-class life in Manhattan, is harshly forced into the world of adulthood upon learning of a dark family secret.
